Leadership and GovernanceCommunityKeep candidateBuilding CommunityCoreThis guide outlines effective leadership and governance models for open source projects, emphasizing the importance of transparency, decision-making processes, and creating a structure that supports long-term project sustainability.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello Hello everyone this is my first look at hugo and how it could be used in the DSC setting.
